title: 2 Bob Harper: Host of the Biggest Loser Discusses Habits and Success
description: Ready to get into physical and mental shape? If so, you're in for a treat with today's guest as the second episode of The School of Greatness is with the host of The Biggest Loser, Bob Harper. I'm constantly connecting with inspiring individuals and I love hearing their story about how they've achieved greatness. That's my main […]
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
